document_data.caption: The fiendish Worghest.
document_data.name: Worghest
document_data.refs3e: {{Cite dragon/350/Legacies of Ancient Empires: Planetouched of Faer√ªn|56-57}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Worghests''' were [[planetouched]], native [[outsider]]s descended from the breeding of [[goblin]]s and [[barghest]]s.
document_data.Ecology: Worghests often lived as feared and respected warriors in [[orc]] and goblin tribes, disdaining positions of power in favor of the freedom of the hunt.
document_data.Description: Worghests descended from barghests and goblins, so they had barghest features, including glowing orange eyes and blue hair.
document_data.Abilities: Worghests shared the ability to consume other [[humanoid]]s with their barghest ancestors. They also had the limited ability to shape-change into a [[wolf]].
